Package pif.objects

Class Cube

java.lang.Object
pif.objects.Cube
public class Cube
extends java.lang.Object
Cube class that contains the rendering and the properties of the cube
Author:
maxim

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Cube()
    Creates a cube at the origin with no angles
    Cube​(double dx, double dy, double dz, double xdeg, double ydeg, double zdeg)
    Creates a cube at a certain position and at a certain angle
    Cube​(int dx, int dy, int dz)
    Creates a cube at a certain position

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Polygon3D[] getPolygon()
    Returns the 3D Polygons of the cube
    double getPosX()
    Returns the position on the X axis
    double getPosY()
    Returns the position on the Y axis
    double getPosZ()
    Returns the position on the Z axis
    double getxDegrees()
    Returns the angle on the X axis
    double getyDegrees()
    Returns the angle on the Y axis
    double getzDegrees()
    Returns the angle on the Z axis
    void oneStep​(double deltaT)
    Calculates the physics of one step of a deltaT
    void render​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
    Renders the cube to the screen Renders the cube's polygon to create the shape
    void rotateTranslate​(double xDeg, double yDeg, double zDeg, double dx, double dy, double dz)
    Function that rotates and translate every points of the cube
    void setPosX​(double posX)
    Sets the position on the X axis
    void setPosY​(double posY)
    Sets the position on the Y axis
    void setPosZ​(double posZ)
    Sets the position on the Z axis
    void setTorque​(double x, double y, double z)
    Sets the torque of the Cube (only for tests)
    void setxDegrees​(float xDegrees)
    Sets the angle on the X axis
    void setyDegrees​(float yDegrees)
    Sets the angle on the Y axis
    void setzDegrees​(float zDegrees)
    Sets the angle on the Z axis

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Cube

      public Cube()
      Creates a cube at the origin with no angles

    • Cube

      public Cube​(int dx, int dy, int dz)
      Creates a cube at a certain position
      Parameters:
      dx - The position of the cube on the X axis (in meters)
      dy - The position of the cube on the Y axis (in meters)
      dz - The position of the cube on the Z axis (in meters)

    • Cube

      public Cube​(double dx, double dy, double dz, double xdeg, double ydeg, double zdeg)
      Creates a cube at a certain position and at a certain angle
      Parameters:
      dx - The position of the cube on the X axis (in meters)
      dy - The position of the cube on the Y axis (in meters)
      dz - The position of the cube on the Z axis (in meters)
      xdeg - The angle of the cube on the X axis (in degrees)
      ydeg - The angle of the cube on the Y axis (in degrees)
      zdeg - The angle of the cube on the Z axis (in degrees)

  • Method Details

    • rotateTranslate

      public void rotateTranslate​(double xDeg, double yDeg, double zDeg, double dx, double dy, double dz)
      Function that rotates and translate every points of the cube
      Parameters:
      xDeg - The angle of the cube on the X axis (in degrees)
      yDeg - The angle of the cube on the Y axis (in degrees)
      zDeg - The angle of the cube on the Z axis (in degrees)
      dx - The position of the cube on the X axis (in meters)
      dy - The position of the cube on the Y axis (in meters)
      dz - The position of the cube on the Z axis (in meters)
